snippet: Lubomir Visnovsky, a 36-year-old defenseman, is the only player under an N.H.L. contract who is refusing to return from a European league after the lockout.
abstract: Lubomir Visnovsky, a 36-year-old defenseman, is the only player under an N.H.L. contract who is refusing to return from a European league after the lockout.

headline.main: K.H.L. Won't Allow Islander to Play Without Waiver
